name: Time Warrior (Lvl3Mage)
description:
This is my first publicly submitted game for the Brackeys 2020.2 GameJam.

This game is an Arena based top-down shooter with a time rewinding and cloning ability. 

The Game contains a lot of upgrades which can only be unlocked by getting them for exp. The faster you complete the wave the more exp you get. While rewinding time your "wave-time" will decrease but your actions are saved and repeated by a clone. So your goal is to optimize your time per wave using maximum time rewind and clones for getting the maximum score.

The controlls are as follows:

WASD - for moving

Mouse - for looking around and shooting

SPACE - for rewinding time

P - to open shop in between waves

Esc - to exit to the menu

All of the assets in the game are made by me exept for this free font this free font and this free cursor texture pack.
